title: the feels when......
body:
you get that mastery 6/7 but have no way to obtain it for a while.

i know i was trying to make a joke
I know. I was also trying to make a joke.
All you need to do is buy mystery champion shard in the store. they cost 1700 and about 2-3 are needed. You forge them into champ shards which you disenchant into blue essence

I know

It was supposed to be a joke ;)
